creator: onealj@apache.org
text:
FillPatternType enum was added in r701797 to XSSFCellStyle, but never added to HSSFCellStyle. In the interest of making the HSSF and XSSF share the same Common SS API and in the interest of having typed parameters, HSSFCellStyle should have the same changes.

We should favor the FillPatternType enum variants and in the future remove the non-typed methods that operate on shorts.
